US concerned about Venezuela's arrest of activist and her familyThe United States is "deeply concerned" by reports that human rights activist Rocio San Miguel and members of her family have been arrested in Venezuela, the White House said on Tuesday. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 17:30:23 GMT PSXIXFNBCNNEJHV553GPZH3F5E https://www.reuters.com/world/us-concerned-about-venezuelas-arrest-activist-her-family-2024-02-13/Reuters世界
Exclusive: Putin's suggestion of Ukraine ceasefire rejected by United States, sources sayRussian President Vladimir Putin's suggestion of a ceasefire in Ukraine to freeze the war was rejected by the United States after contacts between intermediaries, three Russian sources with knowledge of the discussions told Reuters. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 16:36:58 GMT IL4I3OHNVFO3RFKYPL6O4LGVCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putins-suggestion-ukraine-ceasefire-rejected-by-united-states-sources-say-2024-02-13/Guy Faulconbridge, Darya Korsunskaya世界欧洲
Hungary abuse scandal threatens Viktor Orban's 'family values' platformA row over a presidential pardon for a man who helped to cover up sexual abuse in a children's home risks damaging the core appeal of the ruling party of Hungary's Viktor Orban: its commitment to family and Christian values. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 16:34:01 GMT 5LI3BOWQHVMITGEAZEATARFKNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-abuse-scandal-threatens-viktor-orbans-family-values-platform-2024-02-13/Krisztina Than世界欧洲
Polish farmers plan 'complete blockade' of Ukraine border on Feb. 20Polish farmers plan a total blockade of all border crossings with Ukraine on Feb. 20, a trade union said on Tuesday, escalating their month-long strike that began last week in protest against EU policies. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 16:04:39 GMT COOD4Q72INNHJNWRBZCONKXBRI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-farmers-plan-complete-blockade-ukraine-border-feb-20-2024-02-13/Reuters世界欧洲
Hezbollah chief says shelling on Israel will stop only when 'aggression' on Gaza endsThe head of Lebanon's Hezbollah said on Tuesday that his armed group's cross-border shelling into Israel would only end when Israel's "aggression" on the Gaza Strip stops, saying diplomatic efforts so far to bring a halt to hostilities along Lebanon's border seemed to only benefit Israel. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 15:58:09 GMT RT6K66FS4BPY5GTIDCHT2XRAWU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hezbollah-chief-says-shelling-israel-will-stop-only-when-aggression-gaza-ends-2024-02-13/Reuters世界中东
Some Palestinians leave Rafah refuge, fearing Israeli assaultNahla Jarwan fled her home in the central Gaza Strip to seek refuge in Rafah - like more than 1 million other Palestinians escaping Israel's military offensive. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 15:46:26 GMT 6QX2IXDGSFNVTHWFMQTPGETQPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/some-palestinians-leave-rafah-refuge-fearing-israeli-assault-2024-02-13/Mohammad Salem世界中东
From Gaza to Geneva: Swiss doctor evacuates injured childrenWhen Swiss doctor Raouf Salti realised he could not go to Gaza to help injured children, he decided he would do everything he could to get them to Geneva to receive medical care. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 15:27:36 GMT RYNRH424KFPR5PMA33PG3YGKXQ https://www.reuters.com/world/gaza-geneva-swiss-doctor-evacuates-injured-children-2024-02-13/Gabrielle Tétrault-Farber世界
Scabs, axes and heartache: Zagreb museum champions lost love for Valentines DayA scab from an old motorbike accident. An unworn wedding dress. A prosthetic leg. An axe. As the world celebrates Valentines Day on Wednesday, one museum in Zagreb has collected objects that commemorate sometimes bizarre tales of love lost. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 15:20:58 GMT IL4DDQB475OERLLMGGCTP44HTY https://www.reuters.com/lifestyle/scabs-axes-heartache-zagreb-museum-champions-lost-love-valentines-day-2024-02-13/Reuters生活方式
India, UAE sign pact on trans-continental trade corridorIndia and the United Arab Emirates on Tuesday signed an agreement on a trade corridor that aims to connect Europe with India through parts of the Middle East by sea and rail, an ambitious plan backed by the U.S. and the European Union. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 15:14:35 GMT IOZIVPQ5AZO25LUDX7B76GOE4U https://www.reuters.com/world/india-uae-sign-pact-trans-Continental-trade-corridor-2024-02-13/Alexander Cornwell, Bansari Kamdar世界

Palestinians see little solace in Western sanctions against some settlersU.S., British and French sanctions against some Jewish settlers accused of political violence have brought little solace to Palestinians in the occupied West Bank who say such attacks persist, with Israeli security forces standing by or joining in.
